IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "NDA",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), NOT(ISBLANK(CLM_Prospect_Account__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))), LEFT(CLM_Prospect_Account__c, 40) +'-'+"NDA" ))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Agreement Naming Convention for Tran SSA

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF(AND( RecordType.Name = "Supply and Services Agreement", NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ "SSA" +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Supply and Services Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ "SSA" , IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Supply and Services Agreement",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))), "SSA" +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND( RecordType.Name = "Supply and Services Agreement", ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),"SSA",
IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Contract Request",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name))),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ "Contract Request" +'-'+TEXT( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Contract Request",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)),"Contract Request"+'-'+TEXT( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)),
IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Care Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ "Care" +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Care Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ "Care" , IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Care Agreement",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c))), "Care" +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND( RecordType.Name = "Care Agreement", ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),"Care",
IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c)))),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c) +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c)))),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+ TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c))),LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c)))), TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c) +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c))), LEFT(Apttus__Account__r.Name, 40) +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)),ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c))), "Non-Transactional" +'-'+TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c)))), TEXT( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), IF(AND(RecordType.Name = "Non-Transactional Agreement",ISBLANK(Apttus__Account__r.Name), ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c),ISBLANK(TEXT(Apttus__Subtype__c))), "Non-Transactional", "Non-Transactional" ))))))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Agreement Naming convention

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( OR( AND(MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 2, DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 29), AND(MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 3, DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 1)), NOT( OR( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )) , 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 100 ) != 0)))), DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 2, 28), IF( AND( MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 3, DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 1, OR( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )) , 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 100 ) != 0))), DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 2, 29), IF( DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 1, DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ))-1, DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c )-1 ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Auto Population of End Date
CLM Expiry Status Catagory Field Update
Set nonstd legal language to False
Set nonstd legal language to true

rules.fullName: CLM Agreement Name Rule
rules.description: This rule will define the agreement naming convention

rules.fullName: CLM Agreement Name Rule for Transactional Non SSA
rules.description: This rule will define the agreement naming convention of Transactional Non SSA

rules.fullName: CLM Auto Activation of NDA Agreements
CLM Contract Request is created but not submitted to Legal
rules.description: CLM Contract Request is created but not submitted to L & C
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, 'Request'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c , ''), RecordType.Name='Contract Request', ISPICKVAL(CLM_Manual_or_Automatic__c ,'Automatic') )

rules.fullName: CLM Notification to CM AM for Automatic agreement Creation
CLM Renewal Care Agreement Notification on End Date
CLM Renewal Notification
rules.description: The Account Manager should receive an email 6 months before the expiration date.

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification for Care Agreement
rules.description: The Account Manager should receive an email 6 months before and 90 days after the expiration date.

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification for Care Agreement after End Date
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 30,60,90 days after the expiration date.

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification for SSA and Non-Transactional
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email on the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA'), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification_120
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 120 days before the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 120, OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 120, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification_150
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 150 days before the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 150, OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 150, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification_180
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 180 days before the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 180, OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 180, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification_30
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 30 days before the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 30, OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 30, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification_60
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 60 days before the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 60, OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 60, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Renewal Notification_90
rules.description: The AM and CM will receive an email 90 days before the expiration date.
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 90, OR(ISPICKVAL(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c, 'No Auto-Renewal'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Auto_Renewal__c))), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c > TODAY(), Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c - TODAY() >= 90, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Frame_Agreement'))

rules.fullName: CLM Set Term Years to None
rules.description: Nullify Term(Years) when the Agreement End Date is updated
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(CLM_Term_Years__c))), ISCHANGED(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c), (Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c <> IF( AND( OR( AND(MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 2, DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 29), AND(MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 3, DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 1)), NOT( OR( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )) , 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 100 ) != 0)))), DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 2, 28), IF( AND( MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 3, DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 1, OR( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )) , 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 100 ) != 0))), DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), 2, 29), IF( DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ) = 1, DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ))-1, DATE( YEAR( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c) + VALUE(TEXT( CLM_Term_Years__c )), MONTH( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c ), DAY( Apttus__Contract_Start_Date__c )-1 ))))))

rules.fullName: CLM Update Status to Expired for NDA
rules.description: A field update of Status Category and Status happens on NDA agreement post the agreement end date.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , 'In Effect'), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NDA')

rules.fullName: CLM Workato WTD - Agreement G4
rules.description: Send an outbound message to Workato to then request WtD to sync with CRM, all in real time updates when Agreement Approval Status is Ready for G4

rules.fullName: CLM Workato WTD - Agreement G5
rules.description: Send an outbound message to Workato to then request WtD to sync with CRM, all in real time updates when Agreement Approval Status is Ready for G5

rules.fullName: CLM_Auto Population of End Date based on Term
CLM_Set NonStandard Legal Language field
rules.description: Set the field to true if there are any modified agreement clauses

rules.fullName: CLM_Set nonstd legal language to False
